section.p: As you move closer to the sarcophagus, your foot crosses the edge of the pentacle by a few millimetres - it is enough. The lid of the sarcophagus explodes into the air with a deafening crash, and a pillar of black smoke erupts from the stone coffin! The smoke hurtles towards you, like a miniature tornado.

You must fight the tomb guardian.
